{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05220v1", "title": "A fixed point theorem for the action of $SL_n$ over local fields on
  symmetric spaces of infinite dimension and finite rank", "summary": "Let F be a non-archimedean local field, and let $G = SL_n(F)$, $n \ge 3$. Let
$X$ be an infinite-dimensional simply connected symmetric space of finite rank,
with nonpositive curvature operator. We prove that every continuous action by
isometries of $G$ on $X$ has a fixed point.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR,math.MG,math.RT", "published": "2025-05-08T13:12:27Z"}
